name: quill-better-table.liuyisnake
description: Module for better table in Quill, more useful features are supported. which forcked from soccerloway/quill-better-table

scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production --env.minimize; webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production; rm dist/quill-better-table;
scripts.build:win: webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production --env.minimize && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production && del dist\quill-better-table
scripts.publish:win: yarn run build:win && yarn publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org

author: soccerloway
